channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins XPath Configuration Viewer Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins XPath Configuration Viewer Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34813|2024-08-03T09:22:10.414Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20xpath%20configuration%20viewer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins XPath Configuration Viewer Plugin 1.1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to create and delete XPath expressions.

item.title: CVE-2022-34812|2024-08-03T09:22:10.644Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20xpath%20configuration%20viewer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins XPath Configuration Viewer Plugin 1.1.1 and earlier allows attackers to create and delete XPath expressions.

item.title: CVE-2022-34811|2024-08-03T09:22:10.512Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20xpath%20configuration%20viewer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins XPath Configuration Viewer Plugin 1.1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to access the XPath Configuration Viewer page.
